name: Somewhere, in a classic 80 arcade room...
name_original: Somewhere, in a classic 80 arcade room...
description:
Somewhere, in a classic 80 arcade room, something strange is happening...

This is the full version of the game that I had initially planned for the Bitsy Classic Game Jam, on November 21, 2020, in accordance with the theme of the contest, but without the constraint of using version 1.0 of the editor.

The published version for the Game Jam can be found here:

https://jeanmilost.itch.io/somewhere-in-a-80-arcade-room-classic-editor
